page.title: 12MEDIA IN CHAGFORD
page.content: Chagford is served by national daily newspapers and various local ones, on a daily and weekly basis. The{Western {Morning News,}printed in Plymouth, is a popular daily, as is the{Express and {Echo,}printed in Exeter. Popular local weeklies include{Western Times, {Okehampton Times}and{Mid Devon Advert_ {iser. }Chagford has its own monthly paper entitled the{Chagford Bulletin} and the{Parish Magazine}is also pro_ duced monthly.{Youds,}the newsagents sell books as does{Webber and Son,} while the{Primary School}has recently opened a bookshop in one of its class_ rooms. National and regional{Radio} and{TV}programmes are received, such as{Radio Devon, Devonair and TSW.}Some households have{Video Recorders,}tapes for which may be hired from{Bowden and {Son}in Chagford Square.
